Blog.post: ok yeah why me? why do i fall in...i hate love....i hate all that it entitles...i hate the feeling that you know you cant live without someone i feel weak..... i hate the feeling of not talking to them because of whatever......and yeah want to know what sucks the most????? the fact that they know....but the dont know to this level yeah those other feelings i had.....yeah complete bs.......i honestly dont know how to deal with it when is this stupid thing going to be done with me

...i hate people more than i hate people....i hate myself as being a person i cant stand to be stuck in my own mind and start thinking about everything... it all just seems so trivial and it really bothers me... i hate the fact that i apologize for everything, and i feel horrible about things i cant change.......and the worst part..... THEY ARENT EVEN THAT IMPORTANT!!!!! i really just cant stand being around anyone....as happy as i may be in being with my "friends" i really cant stand anyone that much.... my thoughts of everything are so idiotic and insane that why should i share them with people... i really honestly dont know anymore why people would want to be around me....as this being of self-doubt and self-pity anymore.....why am i honestly still here?
urlLink yeah thats me urlLink

Ok so ill admit it i really couldnt take sharing my thoughts with the people i actually knew... im a woose, and a chicken....and god i need them too much for them to turn on me... so yeah......im turning to the world.... the blank..solid..heavy..scary..world to show my thoughts what a hell of a way to do it how sucky is this
all i can say i hate you i hate you for everything the love the help the talks the everything i hate that you get it and i hate everything about me im such a sucky person and i cant take it
yeah summer...sucky...surviving...all go together

ok so i dont apologize for that last post... (yeah not that anyone reads this anyways...) but yeah for those that do...and that are scared...(lol yeah right...) "i swear i dont have a gun..." (nirvana those that didnt get it...) only im serious

this whole being 16 thing... yeah just really not working for me... when you are little, you always want to be older and when you are older, you always want to be younger... yeah my problem...i just want to be gone... i really cant honestly take that whole living with no purpose thing anymore...and as awful as it may sound..its right honestly what's there left that would be better while i was here

yeah i have given up on listening listening to other people's problems just gives you room to get invovled and i really cant take getting invovled anymore i get myself so hooked on how to help that i break myself apart and yeah that seems selfish and hey ill be the first one to admit that i can be at times but seriously if it doesnt directly concern me anymore... i need to stay out so just watch out

i am me i have come to the realization that i really cant change myself...as much as i may want to but my problem is that i dont want to be me anymore... im sick of the lies i tell myself...even sicker of the lies i tell others im sick of the general purpose i seem to have now...of just someone to run to i wish i could run to myself i fear i have lost that essential thing that i need to survive on that one thing that is needed to keep myself going i am here...but my mind wanders..to unthinkable depths in my multiple abysses that i have created where can my mind be found now..

you know those people? the ones who can just instantly be there and do nothing and everything is better? yeah i love my friends god i really think i am the most bi-polar person ever. . . without actually being bi-polar lol anyways i know that they dont read this but i dont want them to i just want to say thanks to everyone who has been a friend to ANYONE at any point in time that just makes you smile heres to my friends...

sometimes you just need things you cant have like that one person that one "them" that you always think about but they arent there im thinking it kills me more knowing that they are there but "just a friend" than not being there at all not that i have one or anything... but anyways like i said sometimes you just need things... god im gone

All around me are familiar faces Worn out places Worn out faces Bright and early for their daily races Going nowhere Going nowhere Their tears are filling up their glasses No expression No expression Hide my head I want to drown my sorrow No tomorrow No tomorrow *chorus* And I find it kind of funny I find it kind of sad The dreams in which I’m dying Are the best I’ve ever had I find it hard to tell you I find it hard to take When people run in circles It’s a very very Mad world Mad world Children waiting for the day they feel good Happy birthday Happy birthday Made to feel the way that every child should Sit and listen Sit and listen Went to school and I was very nervous No one knew me No one knew me Hello teacher tell me what’s my lesson Look right through me Look right through me *chorus* And I find it kind of funny I find it kind of sad The dreams in which I’m dying Are the best I’ve ever had I find it hard to tell you I find it hard to take When people run in circles It’s a very very Mad world Mad world enlarged in your world Mad world

mm k note to those that read this yeah i am a bit insane... yeah i can go a little out there sometimes... and yeah i blow things out of proportion an awful lot... but meh im working on it (so and yeah this is basically a note to myself...i have this rather large feeling that no one reads it)

my head is filled with thoughts of you and i losing ourselves in our minds my heart is filled with the pain and grief that has been brought upon it by stupid mistakes never ment to be done i need you back but i dont want you back you were the best thing that could have happened with the joy and the love but you have brought more sorrow than i could know i want you to keep a reminder of you in my head or i want you to be shreaded to pieces right before my eyes you are there haunting my mind in the same place of avoidance that i created for myself i must find some sort of middle ground before this becomes my downfall

how to write this... its a love/hate relationship with love honestly i hate it so much i hate that feeling...or shall i say all those feelings...the "i cant deal without you" and the "you made me complete" crap because its not crap its the truth which is what scares me i dont know how to deal with that though... i have always stayed for myself...me and me only... none of this "i need my guy to be there so im fine..." junk i dont know how to deal with the "us" instead of the "I" i have broken hearts... no none of that heartbreaker junk...i just have because i couldnt deal with it but now its my heart and i want it back i want him to give me my feelings back...i gave him everything i could...and i need it back i fell too deep too fast no more love for me

"katherine you must lie because your opinions are wrong" "katherine you must lie because you arent worthy" "katherine you must lie because no one loves you, they lie too, its all just a mask" my thoughts tell me to tell the lies i have become i have become what no one wants a hole the "you have to swear not to tell"'s, the tears, the laughs...they are all just a part of the giant play i have created "All the world's a stage, And all the men and women merely players..."(William Shakespeare, "As You Like It") you are all just a part of a scene one block in an act of my life

these are my thoughts these are me i have become words on a page fragments of sentences all put together for people to read my head has become a looking glass mirror that everyone sees themselves and all i see is in i want to be on the other side i want to see my reflection i cant take the darkness that i have found in me anymore it has consumed my mind along with the words and phrases that i have written these forbidden thoughts and prohibited words have become my downfall and they are invisible to the world i need to break down my mirror and let people in my cage needs to be collapsed

i have become myself in my own eyes i am me that is it it is all im suppose to be it is everything im suppose to be... i am katherine i am loud i am loved i am hated i am worried about i am talked about i am worried and i am confident im me im my friends all i need is to tell myself this all the time... maybe someday i shall believe it...
this has become my window

my thoughts are meant to stay in my head they arent meant to be taken out and fooled around with im as serious as im going to get and you need to understand that what i show to people is not what im safe showing it has become a hand to aide in my fight over what my reality has become and what is actually going on around me do not take my words lightly and the apologies made are facades to block off what i dont want to hear anymore im a coward to my own world...and i cant take the non-pressure there is anymore i need someone sitting there saying "just make it through the night...dont cry because you are strong...im not going to let you hang yourself with the rope we gave you..." all i feel now is "katherine you lie...katherine you are a drama queen...katherine get out of your head and just smile..." yeah my smiles dont work anymore just come find me

mm k so i really have no clue what to write im just going to let everything boil out till there is nothing left that i feel like saying i have 10 years left to live i really honestly dont feel like living one more day because honestly...why? what more is there to live for so im putting a timestamp on my life 10 years till im gone love... i hate you all even the ones that i love with all my heart that there isnt a thing that they could do wrong i hate you because i cant stand loving you and letting anything go i need it all too much and i cant let myself need anything because whenever i let my self fall in...i just never stop falling which is my problem "is this your reality or mine?" honestly am i living my life for you in your eyes? or am i living in my eyes and refusing to look? i really am a good kid at heart...im always going to try and be that role-model that i cant achieve because i wont let myself get there my excuse: because i cant let myself win the minute i let myself win i shall never come back down i lie i shall never leave here... i shall never leave my blanket from my room because im scared of what is out there... there are too many things that i refuse to face because i just may never make it to my 10 years... but the problem is... im going to live to be 70 because i have lost control of my life

Dude this is like scary. Everything I put down was right. Take 3 minutes and try this...it will freak you out! The person who sent it to me said her wish came true 10 minutes after they read the mail. BUT NO CHEATING! This game has a funny/spooky outcome. Don't read ahead...just do it in order! It takes about three minutes...it's worth a try First..get a pen and paper. When you actually choose names, make sure it's people you actually know and go with your first instinct. Scroll down one line at a time...and don't read ahead or you'll ruin it! 1. First, write the numbers 1 through 11 in a column. 2. Then, beside numbers 1 and 2, write down any two numbers you want. 3. Beside the 3 and 7, write down the names of members of the opposite sex. NO LOOKING AHEAD...OR IT WON"T TURN OUT RIGHT! 4. Write anyone's name (like friends or family....) in the 4th, 5th, and 6th spots. 5. Write down four song titles in 8,9, 10, and 11. GO WITH YOUR INSTINCT PEOPLE!!!! 6. Finally, make a wish. And now the key for the game..... 1. You must tell (the number in space 2) people about this game. 2. The person in space 3 is the one that you love. 3. The person in 7 is one you like but can't work out. 4. You care most about the person you put in 4. 5. The person you name in number 5 is the one who knows you very well. 6. The person you name in 6 is your lucky star. 7. The song in 8 is the song that matches with the person in number 3. 8. The title in 9 is the song for the person in 7. 9. The tenth space is the song that tells you most about YOUR mind. 10. and 11 is the song telling you how you feel about life NOW...send this to 10 people within the hour you read this...IF you do..your wish will come true. If you don't it will become the opposite. interesting...very interesting

i love my friends its the time of spending 4 hours on the phone talking about the most random stuff ever that really makes everything worthwhile its the spending an hour trying to get the "perfect" man on a quiz because your best friend loves orlando bloom... its the most out there conversations because we dont have a life its all you need sometime its taking the longest rock quiz ever even though you realy dont like it that much thanks

yeah i bet you really missed my sorrowful look into my world... i feel so hot that i cant think... the flames engulf into my mind and turn to ashes what was left im a body with no soul im a person with no purpose im a human with no thought all i can hear is "what else should i be.. all apologies" and i find that i fit into my world... want to know what? f off

Ever since I was little, I have always had a form of it in my life. I need it there. It explains me. As I grew older my music seemed to begin to reflect my state of mind. Whether it be the stage of Hanson, N’SYNC and The Backstreet Boys with their own “unique” styles of bubblegum preteen pop, to my “rebellious” stage of dark feelings and thoughts and finding Nirvana playing somewhere near. It has always been the words that I could not say. When I say,”All I need is my music...” it is because they are the words that I cannot express. My music is my escape. My headphones are my walls to block off the world around me. All I see is pain, grief, and sadness around me. Between my thoughts, and everywhere you look now, on the news, in the papers, in the schools... My headphones give me a momentary loss of what is happening and just to get everything out. In our world of lost lives, lost thoughts, lost feelings. Everyone must have their own avoidance... All anyone needs is an understanding notion, just something to keep their mind away from the “evils”. I have found mine in music yeah i dont know what to write today

Here come old flat top He come groovin' up slowly He got jew jew eyeballs He want holy rollers He got hair down to his knees Got to be a joker He just do what he please He wear no shoeshine He got toe jam football He got monkey finger He shoot Coca Cola He say I know you, you know me One thing I can tell you is You got to be free Come together, right now Over me He bag production He got walrus gumboot He got Ono sideboard He one spinal cracker He got feet down below his knees Hold you in his armchair You can feel his disease Come together, right now Over me He roller coaster He got early warning He got muddy water He one Mojo filter He say one and one and one is three Got to be good looking 'cause he's so hard to see Come together right now Over me Come together, yeah

they slowly creep back into my mind they trickle through the nonsense and bullshit that has taken over they hold one place in my mind as the cancer that keeps growing this "they" is the knives, the pills, the rope that shall be the end of me my "they" has created my mask the "they" shall never fully take over because i wont let it im not going to let my mind win over me and im not me

reading prozac nation again i hae how much sence that book actually makes and i hate the fact that im trying to compare myself to it im not like her...im not depressed...i just cant take my world anymore but whats one to do? you hide out and read under the covers because its the only sane place left

thinking is always interesting.. you have one specific thought in your mind...and if you let it wander...who knows what you can get yourself into... you give off a little hint...just the tip of an iceburg as to whats running through your head...and you never can really know how someone is going to take it the hardest thing..i really do believe..is to just put your thoughts out there... purely exposing yourself to others thoughts and words... dealing with the responsibilities, and consequences of what you may have said lies are much easier to pull off...give someone a smile and a compliment and you can have it down... no wonder im not the american dream
to run away... or just to disappear not a bad thought actually
why cant i finish what i start ...wheres my guitar

ok i hold my head and rub my eyes trying to make sense of everything around me i have locked my door surrounded myself with my music and have a canteen of apple juice next to me you make me... happier than the highest ecstacy more depressed than ... no i cant finish

what is wrong with me? he says one word to me...ok maybe 2.... and i just fall back into his arms it doesnt matter about anything else... hes just there god fcuk it.... i hate him...i really REALLY do i hate him not being there just being "a friend" and i hate thinking about him and i hate the thought of him even possibly coming back just..be..strong

the thoughts of what couldve happened and what did happen flood back to my mind my stomach drops i feel lightheaded i hate this control it has over me that smile the smile you gave me the one that made my knees weak... and the 20 seconds change to 20 hours make my world into another but yeah its only in my dreams with the thought of you caring back and the love come in return to mine its over
dun dun dun red nails and sharpies surround me i know im home

k so drivers license in my grasp so close yet so far failed at so many things in my life i dont want this to be one too i need it so much... not to drive people around... not to get myself places... to just leave i refuse to sit back anymore once the license is here ill just get up and go doesnt matter where... doesnt matter with who... just need the gas and the car its the freedom of just leaving because you can its the best feeling because i know where i am stuck now
leaving for a few days i think i shall be back... dont trust me with too much
merci beacoup mon ami dun dun dun

the scars are hidden invisible you think you see a giant scrape across my arm or a thin line of blood along my leg but they are deep... deep inside my head the safest place to mark them for me its just as dangerous as a cut the first one always the smallest but then growing longer... and deeper... until no going back... look inside my window just at the "right" time and you'll see the scars never healing.. always bleeding the "blood" taking over until there is nothing to take over left

Hope dangles on a string Like slow spinning redemption Winding in and winding out The shine of it has caught my eye And roped me in So mesmerizing, and so hypnotizing I am captivated, I am... [Chorus] Vindicated I am selfish I am wrong I am right I swear I'm right Swear I knew it all along And I am flawed But I am cleaning up so well I am seeing in me now the things you swore you saw yourself So clear Like the diamond in your ring Cut to mirror your intention Oversized and overwhelmed The shine of which has caught my eye And rendered me so isolated, so motivated I am certain now that I am... [Chorus] So turn Up the corners of your lips Part them and feel my finger tips Trace the moment, fall forever Defense is paper thin Just one touch and I'd be in Too deep now to ever swim against the current So let me slip away [3x] So let me slip against the current So let me slip away [4x] [Chorus] Like hope Dangles on a string Like slow spinning redemption...
i love him that plain and simple

i hate crying it proves i am weak the strength i have shown is not true its has been pushed upon and leaned against so it has fallen over the wall has been breetched so now the feelings come out in the form of a flood under a blanket so you cant see my weakness is the death of me it is the words i hear the words i write the words i think the thinking itself the help i try that fails the help i try to gain but never finding this is what i write these are actual thoughts never thought you would hear it from me huh?

where am i? im stuck inside my head im stuck with the thoughts with the feelings everything i dont want anymore i love the phone calls i love hearing a voice that called just for me i hate hearing the sound of no one there the thought of actually being alone scares the hell out of me i cant actually ever take being alone or being with someone i need someone there watching me but i need them to be far enough back to not get me paranoid i am cared for but not how i want to be cared for i am loved but too much and i dont see it i hear the phrase "dont worry be happy", "breathe", "dance like no ones watching, sing like no one is listening, live like theres no tomorrow" all coming from this girl this young woman who is full of promise full of hope and full of said dreams where has she gone? shes dissapeared to a corner with her earphones and a guitar blocking the world out

staring at the blue walls that have surrounded me for the past 6 years doesnt brng me as much peace as it use to the bed is my hiding place, the computer is merely part of my facade the guitar is a block, so i stay by myself i sit and think about everything being written everything being said everything i think... and it all is just bullshit now does anyone really care? does anyone have any clue? does anyone bother to look? because if you saw it... you would basically see someone stuck in their mind with a smile that merely is the fakest thing on the face of the earth yeah im home

goes by too quickly but not fast enough its just there its depended on by too many.... and not cared about by few in overall thinking we hold a spec of it to ourselves but while here its everything the end
lol i am amazing and i shall rule the world no i dont believe it but just nod and smile pure amazing maybe i am semi normal

signifies thinking... signifies some thought going through the mind... whether it be good, evil, of indifference can change the world... one thought could change everything imagine.... im thinking ending it there sounds like a good idea

whoa if anyone cares.....sorry about not writing since monday no license but its probably for the best...planning the thelma and louise route but yeah no freedom... the worst part...i dont think anyone really cared...i mean i got all the apologies and "youll do better next time"s but they were all just sorta half-assed and i know that someof the people with their apologies do read this.....well fuck you....i dont care i wanted it so bad...i just wanted to leave im sorry im not happy at home ? yeah ok so maybe i am....i have an amazing family... great friends and people surrounding me and supporting everything i do but for some reason it just doesnt bring me the unconditional happiness i expect to see in a family i hear it from my friends that they hate their own individual houses...but they love others.....and believe me i say it all the time to.... but is it really that good idea to plan certain things, plan to run away with your car.....and hide out in your room until you can?

im here im here and listening the things you think that go in one ear and out the other stick around they remind me of the jokes made the times i was laughed at the things that bring me down as gone as i may act... its so you dont worry because if you actually saw me without the drunk smile...or the stoned eyes...what would you really think? no im not the brightest person no i will never mount up to my brother, my friends....or even my younger sister... but do you have to remind me? the falling asleep in class... the advils... merely things to make me feel like i have a reason for failing once you see past all these lies i have created...what will you see left?

i envy pirates i envy anyone with freedom i envy thelma and louise the thought of being able to just go to get up and leave is the most passionate dream i have in me to go... never look back.. even with the cares in your mind... leaving...its my wish maybe im just running from something maybe i just like the thought of someone worrying where i am, or caring where i go but to be honest... i dont give a fuck (a hush comes over the readers...) OMG! she cussed... OMG! shes turning into such a teenager fuck you

What else should I be All apologies What else could I say Everyone is gay What else could I write I don't have the right What else should I be All apologies In the sun In the sun I feel as one In the sun In the sun I'm married Buried I wish I was like you Easily amused Find my nest of salt Everything is my fault I'll take all the blame Aqua seafoam shame Sunburn with freezeburn Choking on the ashes of her enemy In the sun In the sun I feel as one In the sun In the sun Married, Maried, Maried! Buried! Yeah yeah yeah yeah All in all is all we are (x20)
